Summary: a bright light appeared in sky, then desended and began flashing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Barnegat Township
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog about 9pm when I first noticed what I thought was a star it was rapidly changing colors, then off to the left of that object a bright ball of light appeared I watched as it slowly decended down into the woods and began flashing a white light. I've tried to come up with a logical explaination, but I cant. Every night since I saw this happen I have returned to the spot, so far the flashing light is still out there, It has been 7 days now.
